tests.name: Software Version
tests.run:
printf "GH Actions runner software versions

"; printf "SYSTEM:	$(uname -a)
"; printf "SHELL:	[${SHELL}]
"; printf "GIT:	[$(which git)] $(git --version)
"; printf "CURL:	[$(which curl)] $(curl --version | head -n 1)
"; printf "NODE:	[$(which node)] node $(node -v)
"
